mapper.sql: SELECT t.`id` id, t.`apply_no` applyNo, t.`apply_type` applyType, t.`cust_id` custId, t.`cust_type` custType, t.`fy_acc_no` fyAccNo, t.`fy_acc_nm` fyAccNm, t.`order_no` orderNo, t.`amt` amt, t.`apply_state` applyState, t.`trade_state` tradeState, t.`create_time` createTime, t.`modify_time` modifyTime, t.`busi_no` busiNo, t.`busi_type` busiType, t.`seq_no` seqNo, t.`mchn` mchn, t.`channel_no` channelNo, t.`contract_no` contractNo, t.`chg_cd` chgCd, t.`chg_dt` chgDt, t.`fy_bank` fyBank, t.`fy_bank_branch` fyBankBranch, t.`desc_code` descCode FROM `t_gq_fss_offline_recharge` t
